briefTitle: To Study Generic Clindamycin 1%/Benzoyl Peroxide 5% Topical Gel (Glenmark Generics, Ltd) in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris.
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group, Multiple-Site Study to Evaluate the Therapeutic Equivalence of a Generic Clindamycin 1%/Benzoyl Peroxide 5% Topical Gel (Glenmark Generics, Ltd) to the Marketed Product BenzaClin速 Topical Gel, Clindamycin 1%/Benzoyl Peroxide 5% (Valeant Pharmaceuticals, US) in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris.
summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, multiple-site, placebo-controlled, parallel-group study, designed to compare the efficacy and safety of generic Clindamycin 1%/ Benzoyl peroxide 5% topical gel (Glenmark Generics, Ltd), and the marketed product BenzaClin速 Topical Gel, Clindamycin 1%/ Benzoyl peroxide 5% (Valeant Pharmaceuticals, US) in the treatment of acne vulgaris.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Percent Change in the Number of Inflamed Lesions (Papules/Pustules)
